text:
We shall be pausing here @StPeterMancroft at 12noon as part of the #nationaldayofreflection 
We shall also be open if you wish to come and 
• Light a candle
• Reflect
• Remember loved ones
• Give thanks for those who have made the #COVID19 #vaccine and for the #NHS staff. https://t.co/0tXEcALcIF
